title: add Azure specific e2e test
body:
Initialize the test framework for Azure specific e2e tests</br></br>
**Usage:</br>**
cd tests/azure-test</br>
ginkgo</br>

title: [WIP]add skip validation
body:
# Skip Validation

 ## How to run locally
1. If there is no e2e test report, follow [E2E tests](https://github.com/kubernetes/cloud-provider-azure/master/docs/e2e-tests.md) to generate one.</br>
2. Set environment variable `CLUSTER_NAME=<name of cluster or report directory path>` </br>
3. `go run tests/skip-validation/main.go`

title: Add more configuration options for e2e tests
body:
This PR adds more configuration options for e2e tests, which enables to run the e2e tests with kube-controller-manager mode, e.g.

```sh
export IMAGE_REGISTRY=<registry>
export K8S_BRANCH=release-1.12
export TEST_MANIFEST=linux-kcm
make test-e2e
```

title: Update kubernetes version to 1.13.0 alpha.3
body:
This PR

- Update kubernetes version to 1.13.0 alpha.3
- Update acs-engine to v0.25.0
- Make their version configurable by env variables

body: Fix typos: levae->levae, pulic->public

title: Fix log message: virtural->virtual
body: Fix log message: virtural -> virtual

title: [DO NOT MERGE] test only
body: Test only.

title: Add more skip tests
body:
Sig azure page on test grid is on now (https://testgrid.k8s.io/sig-azure-master), but some features added in v1.13 are failing now.

Since acs-engine doesn't support 1.13 yet, let's add those tests into skip list now.

title: Put results into $ARTIFACTS and reduce hyperkube build logs
body:
Refer #75

> Junit output should be stored in the directory specified by the $ARTIFACTS environment variable and in files with names that match the regexp: junit.*\.xml

title: Setup artifacts volume for runner
body: This is required because artifacts path is different from workspace path: `/log/artifacts` vs `/workspace`.

title: Fix some typos in docs
body:
1: "opertions" to "operations" in line 40.
2. "untli" to "until" in line 77.
3. "PersistantVolumeClaims" to "PersistentVolumeClaims" in line 125.
4. "accessiable" to "accessible" in line 298.
5. "parellel" to "parallel" in line 499.
6. "permsision" to "permission" in line 8.

title: Update cloud-provider-config.md
body: fixed a typo for "false"

title: Update documentation on multiple scale set support
body:
Correct an error in the documentation stating that you cannot add multiple scale sets to a load balancer. You can in fact do this as long as you are using the Load Balancer Standard SKU.

```release-note
NONE
```

title: Update tests and docs to use aks-engine
body:
- Update e2e test to use aks-engine release v0.31.0 with https://github.com/Azure/aks-engine/pull/492 to fix broken prow job: https://testgrid.k8s.io/sig-azure-master#azure-master-conformance
- Update the apimodel manifest to v1.14 so that aks-engine can remove deprecated flag
- Update docs where applicable

NOTE: The long term fix to point aks-engine release to a url from storage blob, instead of updating releases, will be in a followup PR after the prow job issue has been fixed.

cc @feiskyer @PatrickLang 

**Notes**:
```release-note
Update tests and docs to use aks-engine v0.31.0 to fix e2e tests
```

title: Bump aks-engine to v0.31.1 to support private ACR
body:
Incorporate aks-engine update: https://github.com/Azure/aks-engine/pull/523

**Notes**:

```release-note
Update tests and docs to use aks-engine v0.31.1 to support private ACR to fix e2e tests
```
